title: Albion’s New ZOA Lineup Embraces Cold and Wet Weather
content: Albion continues its rollout of 2021 apparel with a major drop, just before the holiday season. Its new ZOA lineup tackles warm and dry on-the-bike apparel with the bright orange ZOA Rain Shell, which uses a 100% recycled Pertex® Shield Air main fabric with an air-permeable nanofibre membrane and the ZOA Insulated Jacket which utilizes Pertex® Quantum outer fabric and Primaloft Gold Eco breathable insulation to deliver a lightweight but warm riding jacket. Both of these new items are shipping today from Albioncycling.com.
author: prolly
